title: JOIN THE BULLETPROOF CLUB
body:
Hey guys!
I made a club called "BLP" which stands for 'bulletproof' as I hope that my team and I can stand strong in game and win as many victories possible. Thank you to those who have already showed their interest ^-^

If you want to join my club, feel free to contact me by messaging me underneath this with your summoner name or on discord (add me @Bri#2374).  Alternatively, you can also join my discord channel! BLP promotes sportsmanship, teamwork and make the game more enjoyable (without salty players and flaming). 

Click[ here](https://discord.gg/VKDgZ9) for my discord channel! 

All welcome! Hope to see you on the rift! (and in my club!)
- Cypher7

Terms & Conditions:
- must be in OCE (Oceania)
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: Can you send me an invite please?
Snowballing  Yo mind if i can join i have already addy you
Omg I'm so sorry I didn't reply to you sooner! I have just invited you to my club!
StonedAdvantage - I would like to join if your taking ppl?
Hi! Sure, I'm still adding people. BLP is open for all. I sent a friend request so just accept it and I'll invite you to the club.
